name: 陳香君
objective:
本課程主要探索分析不實訊息的方法，透過這門課將學習到異常訊息、社交工程、傳播路徑及深度造假等對不實訊息分析的技術，包含語意分析、帳號識別分析及傳播路徑對不實訊息的影響分析。
This course is mainly to explore the methods of analyzing false information. Through this course, you will learn the techniques of analyzing false information, such as abnormal information, social engineering, propagation path and deep fake, including semantic analysis, account identification analysis and propagation path. Analysis of the impact of false information.
schedule:
Wk1: Overview
Wk2: Introduction of the false information
Wk3-5: Text Analysis Methods for Misinformation
Wk6-8: Social engineering (Types & Methods)
Wk9-12: Propagation Path analysis (Method and techniques)  
Wk13-15: Network traffic analysis and tools introduction
Wk16-18: Project presentation and case study
